clinical_study.brief_title: Study of Anlotinib in Patients With Primary Malignant Bone Tumors
clinical_study.official_title: A Single-Arm, Open-Label, Multicenter Clinical Trial With Anlotinib Hydrochloride Capsule for Primary Malignant Bone Tumors With Recurrence and Distant Metastases

brief_summary.textblock: To evaluate the safety and efficacy of patients with recurrent and metastatic bone tumors.

primary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of 6 month
primary_outcome.description: From random grouping to the objective progression or death of a tumor

secondary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of 10 month
secondary_outcome.description: The time in which the group begins to cause death for any reason

arm_group.description: Anlotinib QD po and it should be continued until disease progression or intolerable toxicity or patients withdrawal of consent

intervention.description: Anlotinib QD po and it should be continued until disease progression or intolerable toxicity or patients withdrawal of consent
